actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to designate buildings 315, 318, and 319 located at the William J. Hughes Technical Center of the Federal Aviation Administration in Atlantic City, New Jersey, as the "Frank R. Lautenberg Aviation Security Complex".

summary.text: Designates specified buildings located at the William J. Hughes Technical Center of the Federal Aviation Administration in Atlantic City, New Jersey, as the Frank R. Lautenberg Aviation Security Complex.

titles.title: A bill to designate buildings 315, 318, and 319 located at the William J. Hughes Technical Center of the Federal Aviation Administration in Atlantic City, New Jersey, as the "Frank R. Lautenberg Aviation Security Complex".
